title: How to Cheat on Wii Sports

steps.title: When you choose single game, best of 3, or best of 5, select one of your Miis.
steps.content: When you choose single game, best of 3, or best of 5, select one of your Miis. It will become a question mark. This is a computer player now. There is only 1 of you.

steps.title: Select it again to change it back.
steps.content: Select it again to change it back.

steps.title: Click on a computer character.
steps.content: Click on a computer character. Now he is you! You can change sides, watch the computer play, all that stuff by doing this. You can even play as all 4 of them with a split screen (which can get kind of confusing, but it's really cool).

steps.title: Move over to the right tip of the second triangle.
steps.content: Move over to the right tip of the second triangle. The triangle is used for the aiming position.

steps.title: When you are ready to bowl, twist your wrist to the left (for spin control).
steps.content: When you are ready to bowl, twist your wrist to the left (for spin control).

steps.title: While the screen is black before you choose single game, best of 3, or best of 5, hold down (1) and (2).
steps.content: While the screen is black before you choose single game, best of 3, or best of 5, hold down (1) and (2). You will notice the field is blue. This is the training field for tennis .

steps.title: To do this, hit the ball at its highest peak, and flick your wrist.
steps.content: To do this, hit the ball at its highest peak, and flick your wrist.

steps.title: Before you pitch, press (2).
steps.content: Before you pitch, press (2). You will pitch underhand. This makes it much harder for your opponent to hit the ball.

steps.title: Press (1) to change it back to normal.
steps.content: Press (1) to change it back to normal. Note: Some computer players can do this.

steps.title: To pitch the ball to the left or right, hold down Left or Right on the control pad while pitching.
steps.content: To pitch the ball to the left or right, hold down Left or Right on the control pad while pitching. This is useful for throwing it away from the batter. Note: Some computer players can do this, too.

steps.title: In the Power Throw training, when there are 91 pins, curve your aim a notch or two, and move as far as you can to the blue wall.
steps.content: In the Power Throw training, when there are 91 pins, curve your aim a notch or two, and move as far as you can to the blue wall.

steps.title: Try to roll it on top of the wall.
steps.content: Try to roll it on top of the wall. If it stays on the wall, you will hear a boom, and all 91 pins will fall. This only works on the last round with 91 pins.

steps.title: Before the game starts, when the screen is black, press up for a blue ball (default), right for a gold ball, down for a green ball, and left for a pink ball.
steps.content: Before the game starts, when the screen is black, press up for a blue ball (default), right for a gold ball, down for a green ball, and left for a pink ball.

steps.title: To get a special ball, you have to get a skill level of 1000 or more.
steps.content: To get a special ball, you have to get a skill level of 1000 or more. You cannot get it back to normal unless your skill level goes down again.

steps.title: To disable the power meter, map, and the wind speed indicator, hold (2) until the game starts (do not let go of 2 until it's done showing you the course).
steps.content: To disable the power meter, map, and the wind speed indicator, hold (2) until the game starts (do not let go of 2 until it's done showing you the course).

steps.title: On hole 3, look to the left on the map.
steps.content: On hole 3, look to the left on the map. In the trees, you can see a small patch of fairway.

steps.title: Hit the ball there.
steps.content: Hit the ball there. You can see the green in the distance right in front of you. This gives you a chance for a Double-Eagle, or an Albatross. Note: This is pretty risky to do.

steps.title: After you've beaten the champion, Matt, you'll be able to wear silver boxing gloves.
steps.content: After you've beaten the champion, Matt, you'll be able to wear silver boxing gloves. To do this, hold (1) when the screen becomes black before the boxing match.
